request.description: Fetch the DP5 version and build number
Return the DP5 status
Shutdown the DP5 headless
Fetch licence details for DP5
Fetch the linear reader status(the value returned are string value from enum LinearReaderStatus)
Fetch the linear reader scan result such as barcode and the image used to decode barcode
Fetch the image frame from the connected Ziath Linear reader

query.description: If the raw image used for scan is required (default is false)
If the annotated image used for scan decode is required (default is false)
If the linear reader image for the container is required (default is false)

request.description:
Fetch the data for the rack scan that is placed on the scanner for the container unique id provided.
Images like raw, annotated and linear images can be fetched based on the flag provided.

response.name: Get Rack scan data

query.description: If the raw image used for scan is required (default is false)
If the annotated image used for scan decode is required (default is false)
If the linear reader image for the container is required (default is false)

request.description: get the container detail based on the container uid given

item.name: Get all containers configured in DP5

request.description: Fetch all the containers available DP5

response.name: Get all containers configured in DP5

item.name: Get default containers avaiable for scanner

request.description: Get all container types available in DP5 for the given scanner type

response.name: Get default containers avaiable for scanner

query.description: Scanner guid which can be fetched from the Scanners endpoint and get all scanner details
this value can be received from the default container types for the scanner you are adding the container too

request.description: Adding a container to a specific scanner in DP5 with the key value parameters like, container name, container unique id and the container type.

item.name: Adding a container using rack template

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<container automatic="false" defaultContainer="SBS96" guid="" name="96 SBS rack j" numberOfCols="12" numberOfRows="8" uid="cubeV296sbs fthe">
    <decodeProcessors>
        <decodeProcessor decode="FAST">
            <imageProcessors>
                <imageProcessor methodName="RUN_DECODE">
                    <parameters/>
                </imageProcessor>
            </imageProcessors>
            <parameters/>
        </decodeProcessor>
        <decodeProcessor decode="DEEP">
            <imageProcessors>
                <imageProcessor methodName="RUN_DECODE">
                    <parameters/>
                </imageProcessor>
            </imageProcessors>
            <parameters>
                <entry>
                    <key>BARCODE_RELATIVE_SIZE</key>
                    <value>1</value>
                </entry>
            </parameters>
        </decodeProcessor>
    </decodeProcessors>
    <locations>
        <location row="1" column="1" x="370" y="435" cutoutSize="164.0" visualisationSize="150.0"/>
        <location row="1" column="2" x="370" y="630" cutoutSize="164.0" visualisationSize="150.0"/>

request.description: Adding a container directly to the scanner by the rack template, which is an XML file provided by Ziath or you get when you export an existing template from DP5

response.name: Adding a container using rack template

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<container automatic="false" defaultContainer="SBS96" guid="" name="96 SBS rack j" numberOfCols="12" numberOfRows="8" uid="cubeV296sbs fthe">
    <decodeProcessors>
        <decodeProcessor decode="FAST">
            <imageProcessors>
                <imageProcessor methodName="RUN_DECODE">
                    <parameters/>
                </imageProcessor>
            </imageProcessors>
            <parameters/>
        </decodeProcessor>
        <decodeProcessor decode="DEEP">
            <imageProcessors>
                <imageProcessor methodName="RUN_DECODE">
                    <parameters/>
                </imageProcessor>
            </imageProcessors>
            <parameters>
                <entry>
                    <key>BARCODE_RELATIVE_SIZE</key>
                    <value>1</value>
                </entry>
            </parameters>
        </decodeProcessor>
    </decodeProcessors>

item.name: Get configured scanner based on filters

query.description: container id, to get the scanner for which the container is added,, default value is empty
if set true only return the container if it is currently connected,, default value is false
the scanner serial number, default value is empty
type of the scanner, default value is empty

response.name: Get configured scanner based on filters

if set true only return the container if it is currently connected,, default value is false
the scanner serial number, default value is empty
type of the scanner, default value is empty
